articles.description: India vs England: Uttarakhand Police's safety advisory for drivers also poked some fun at India captain Virat Kohli.
articles.content: India captain Virat Kohli got out on a duck as England beat the hosts convincingly in the 1st T20 International to take a 1-0 lead in the five-match series. Having been rapped on the gloves by a Jofr… [+1284 chars]
